knimeNode.name: Port to File Cells
knimeNode.shortDescription: Enables files to be stored in a table in order to send them from a cluster node to the client.

fullDescription.intro: When processing files in parallel on a cluster KNIME expects the results to be a table that is concatenated locally. To send files from a cluster node back to the client they must be put into a table with cells that contain a reference to a file. Once the table is sent back to the client, the file is taken along.

ports.inPort: The file to put into a table
